1: לִשְׁלֹמֹ֨ה ׀ <sup>8010 </sup> <n>[A Psalm] for Solomon</n> אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>O God</n> מִ֭שְׁפָּטֶיךָ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>thy judgments</n> לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> תֵּ֑ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Give</n> וְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>and thy righteousness</n> לְבֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>son</n> מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>unto the king's</n>
2: יָדִ֣ין <sup>1777 </sup> <n>He shall judge</n> עַמְּךָ֣ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>thy people</n> בְצֶ֑דֶק <sup>6664 </sup> <n>with righteousness</n> וַעֲנִיֶּ֥יךָ <sup>6041 </sup> <n>and thy poor</n> בְמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>with judgment</n>
3: יִשְׂא֤וּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>shall bring</n> הָרִ֓ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>The mountains</n> שָׁ֘ל֥וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peace</n> לָעָ֑ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>to the people</n> וּ֝גְבָע֗וֹת <sup>1389 </sup> <n>and the little hills</n> בִּצְדָקָֽה׃ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>by righteousness</n>
4: יִשְׁפֹּ֤ט ׀ <sup>8199 </sup> <n>He shall judge</n> עֲ‍ֽנִיֵּי־ <sup>6041 </sup> <n>the poor</n> עָ֗ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> י֭וֹשִׁיעַ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>he shall save</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> אֶבְי֑וֹן <sup>34 </sup> <n>of the needy</n> וִֽידַכֵּ֣א <sup>1792 </sup> <n>and shall break in pieces</n> עוֹשֵֽׁק׃ <sup>6231 </sup> <n>the oppressor</n>
5: יִֽירָא֥וּךָ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>They shall fear</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>thee as long as</n> שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>the sun</n> וְלִפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>endure</n> יָ֝רֵ֗חַ <sup>3394 </sup> <n>and moon</n> דּ֣וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>throughout all</n> דּוֹרִֽים׃ <sup>1755 </sup> <n>generations</n>
6: יֵ֭רֵד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>He shall come down</n> כְּמָטָ֣ר <sup>4306 </sup> <n>like rain</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> גֵּ֑ז <sup>1488 </sup> <n>upon the mown</n> כִּ֝רְבִיבִ֗ים <sup>7241 </sup> <n>grass as showers</n> זַרְזִ֥יף <sup>2222 </sup> <n>[that] water</n> אָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n>
7: יִֽפְרַח־ <sup>6524 </sup> <n>flourish</n> בְּיָמָ֥יו <sup>3117 </sup> <n>In his days</n> צַדִּ֑יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>shall the righteous</n> וְרֹ֥ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>and abundance</n> שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>of peace</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>till</n> בְּלִ֥י <sup>1097 </sup> <n>is no</n> יָרֵֽחַ׃ <sup>3394 </sup> <n>so long as the moon</n>
8: וְ֭יֵרְדְּ <sup>7287 </sup> <n>He shall have dominion</n> מִיָּ֣ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>also from sea</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> יָ֑ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>to sea</n> וּ֝מִנָּהָ֗ר <sup>5104 </sup> <n>and from the river</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> אַפְסֵי־ <sup>657 </sup> <n>unto the ends</n> אָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n>
9: לְ֭פָנָיו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יִכְרְע֣וּ <sup>3766 </sup> <n>shall bow</n> צִיִּ֑ים <sup>6728 </sup> <n>They that dwell in the wilderness</n> וְ֝אֹיְבָ֗יו <sup>341 </sup> <n>him and his enemies</n> עָפָ֥ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>the dust</n> יְלַחֵֽכוּ׃ <sup>3897 </sup> <n>shall lick</n>
10: מַלְכֵ֬י <sup>4428 </sup> <n>The kings</n> תַרְשִׁ֣ישׁ <sup>8659 </sup> <n>of Tarshish</n> וְ֭אִיִּים <sup>339 </sup> <n>and of the isles</n> מִנְחָ֣ה <sup>4503 </sup> <n>presents</n> יָשִׁ֑יבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall bring</n> מַלְכֵ֥י <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the kings</n> שְׁבָ֥א <sup>7614 </sup> <n>of Sheba</n> וּ֝סְבָ֗א <sup>5434 </sup> <n>and Seba</n> אֶשְׁכָּ֥ר <sup>814 </sup> <n>gifts</n> יַקְרִֽיבוּ׃ <sup>7126 </sup> <n>shall offer</n>
11: וְיִשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>shall fall down</n> ל֥וֹ כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מְלָכִ֑ים <sup>4428 </sup> <n>Yea all kings</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> גּוֹיִ֥ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>before him all nations</n> יַֽעַבְדֽוּהוּ׃ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>shall serve</n>
12: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יַ֭צִּיל <sup>5337 </sup> <n>For he shall deliver</n> אֶבְי֣וֹן <sup>34 </sup> <n>the needy</n> מְשַׁוֵּ֑עַ <sup>7768 </sup> <n>when he crieth</n> וְ֝עָנִ֗י <sup>6041 </sup> <n>the poor</n> וְֽאֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>has</n> עֹזֵ֥ר <sup>5826 </sup> <n>also and [him] that hath no helper</n> לֽוֹ׃
13: יָ֭חֹס <sup>2347 </sup> <n>He shall spare</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> דַּ֣ל <sup>1800 </sup> <n>the poor</n> וְאֶבְי֑וֹן <sup>34 </sup> <n>and needy</n> וְנַפְשׁ֖וֹת <sup>5315 </sup> <n>the souls</n> אֶבְיוֹנִ֣ים <sup>34 </sup> <n>of the needy</n> יוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>and shall save</n>
14: מִתּ֣וֹךְ <sup>8496 </sup> <n>from deceit</n> וּ֭מֵחָמָס <sup>2555 </sup> <n>and violence</n> יִגְאַ֣ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>He shall redeem</n> נַפְשָׁ֑ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>their soul</n> וְיֵיקַ֖ר <sup>3365 </sup> <n>and precious</n> דָּמָ֣ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>shall their blood</n> בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>be in his sight</n>
15: וִיחִ֗י <sup>2421 </sup> <n>And he shall live</n> וְיִתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and to him shall be given</n> לוֹ֮ מִזְּהַ֪ב <sup>2091 </sup> <n>of the gold</n> שְׁ֫בָ֥א <sup>7614 </sup> <n>of Sheba</n> וְיִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <sup>6419 </sup> <n>prayer also shall be made</n> בַּעֲד֣וֹ <sup>1157 </sup> <n>about</n> תָמִ֑יד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>for him continually</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[and] daily</n> יְבָרֲכֶֽנְהֽוּ׃ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>shall he be praised</n>
16: יְהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> פִסַּת־ <sup>6451 </sup> <n>There shall be an handful</n> בַּ֨ר ׀ <sup>1250 </sup> <n>of corn</n> בָּאָרֶץ֮ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the earth</n> בְּרֹ֪אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>upon the top</n> הָ֫רִ֥ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>of the mountains</n> יִרְעַ֣שׁ <sup>7493 </sup> <n>thereof shall shake</n> כַּלְּבָנ֣וֹן <sup>3844 </sup> <n>like Lebanon</n> פִּרְי֑וֹ <sup>6529 </sup> <n>the fruit</n> וְיָצִ֥יצוּ <sup>6692 </sup> <n>shall flourish</n> מֵ֝עִ֗יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>and [they] of the city</n> כְּעֵ֣שֶׂב <sup>6212 </sup> <n>like grass</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n>
17: יְהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>endure</n> שְׁמ֨וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>His name</n> לְֽעוֹלָ֗ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>shall endure for ever</n> לִפְנֵי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>as long as</n> שֶׁמֶשׁ֮ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>the sun</n> [יָנִין כ] (יִנֹּ֪ון <sup>5125 </sup> <n>be continued</n> ק) שְׁ֫מ֥וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> וְיִתְבָּ֥רְכוּ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>and [men] shall be blessed</n> ב֑וֹ כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> גּוֹיִ֥ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>in him all nations</n> יְאַשְּׁרֽוּהוּ׃ <sup>833 </sup> <n>shall call him blessed</n>
18: בָּר֤וּךְ ׀ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Blessed</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[be] the LORD</n> אֱ֭לֹהִים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <sup>430 </sup> <n>the God</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> עֹשֵׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>who only doeth</n> נִפְלָא֣וֹת <sup>6381 </sup> <n>wondrous things</n> לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <sup>905 </sup> <n>alone</n>
19: וּבָר֤וּךְ ׀ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>And blessed</n> שֵׁ֥ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>name</n> כְּבוֹד֗וֹ <sup>3519 </sup> <n>[be] his glorious</n> לְע֫וֹלָ֥ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n> וְיִמָּלֵ֣א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>be filled</n> כְ֭בוֹדוֹ <sup>3519 </sup> <n>[with] his glory</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כֹּ֥ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and may the whole</n> הָאָ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and let the whole earth</n> אָ֘מֵ֥ן ׀ <sup>543 </sup> <n>Amen</n> וְאָמֵֽן׃ <sup>543 </sup> <n>and Amen</n>
20: כָּלּ֥וּ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>are ended</n> תְפִלּ֑וֹת <sup>8605 </sup> <n>The prayers</n> דָּ֝וִ֗ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יִשָֽׁי׃ <sup>3448 </sup> <n>of Jesse</n>
